title: Field Buffs
paragraph: Fields outside of the starter islands can have buffs assigned to them. Field buffs are permanent and stay until the end of the world.

dynamicContents.content: A field has a 5/16 chance to have one buff and a 1/16 change to have two buffs. Portals can't have any buffs.

Not every buff is equally strong. There are three strength categories: 'one star', 'two stars' and 'three stars'. The more stars, the stronger the buff. The strength of the buff has been randomly generated and can vary from buff to buff, even if two buffs have the same amount of stars. The rarity of buffs increases with the amount of stars.
